title: Around a gum tree
creator_credit: Owen Brothers Animated Films, David Bilcock, Geoffrey Bell and Shell Oil Company
brief_description: Shows examples of Australia’s many varieties of gum trees growing in their natural surroundings. The way people live in the different types of country is described in addition to the main story of the gum trees themselves.
creator_credit_for_label: Owen Brothers Animated Films, David Bilcock, Geoffrey Bell and Shell Oil Company
